name: Switch.Root
description: A control element that allows for a binary selection.
description_zh: A control element that allows for a binary selection.

asChild.description: Use the provided child element as the default rendered element, combining their props and behavior.
asChild.description_zh: 使用提供的子元素作为默认渲染元素，结合它们的 props 和行为。

defaultChecked.description:
The checked state of the switch when it is first rendered.
Use this when you do not need to control the state of the switch.
defaultChecked.description_zh:
首次渲染 switch 时的 checked 状态。
当您不需要控制 switch 的状态时，请使用此选项。

form.description: The id of the form that the switch belongs to

id.description: The unique identifier of the machine.

ids.type:
Partial<{
  root: string
  hiddenInput: string
  control: string
  label: string
  thumb: string
}>
ids.description: The ids of the elements in the switch. Useful for composition.
ids.description_zh: switch 中元素的 id。对合成很有用。

invalid.description: If `true`, the switch is marked as invalid.
invalid.description_zh: 如果为 'true'，则 switch 被标记为无效。

label.description: Specifies the localized strings that identifies the accessibility elements and their states
label.description_zh: 指定标识辅助功能元素及其状态的本地化字符串

name.description:
The name of the input field in a switch
(Useful for form submission).
name.description_zh:
开关中输入字段的名称
（用于表单提交）。

required.description: If `true`, the switch input is marked as required,
required.description_zh: 如果为“true”，则开关输入标记为必需，

value.description: The value of switch input. Useful for form submission.
value.description_zh: switch input 的值。用于表单提交。

events.name: checkedChange
events.description: Function to call when the switch is clicked.
events.description_zh: 单击开关时调用的函数。

events.name: update:checked
events.description: The callback fired when the model value changes.
events.description_zh: 当 model 值更改时触发回调。
